issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: webconsole
components.description: Web console such as the old and the new hawtio console

fields.description:
activemq-web-console.war file has manifest which exports org.apache.activemq* packages. As a result, in Karaf a bundle which imports any of these packages may be hooked to web-console bundle instead of activemq-osgi. This leads to problems, like:
{noformat}
13:44:01,679 | ERROR | nsole user karaf | container.BlueprintContainerImpl  403 | 12 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.4.3 | Unable to start blueprint container for bundle event-logging-collector-jms

fields.summary: ActiveMQ Web Console war file exports org.apache.activemq
